pages.Most_Probable_Explanation.layout
pages.Most_Probable_Explanation.evid_gen(dd_vals, b_e, op_s, e_var, e_in, q_var, e_op, op_i)

Receives appCallback events and manages these to the correct

Parameters

  • dd_vals – All Varietals used in Evidence Section are chosen

  • b_e – Trigger if the Zoom Button in the Evidence is Pressed

  • op_s – Trigger if the Modal parameter from a Zoom should be saved

  • e_var – the Dropdown of variable of Evidence Section

  • e_in – the Input for the Variables of Evidence Section

  • q_var – the Dropdown of variable of Query Section

  • e_op – Information of whiche Zoom Button was pressed in the Evidence section

  • op_i – The Values choosen in the Zoom Modal

Returns

Updatet Varibel List and the Input.

pages.Most_Probable_Explanation.modal_router(op, op_i, m_bod, dd)

Recessive all App Calls that are change the Modal for the zoom Function

Parameters

  • op – Trigger to add More Input Option by Numeric Variabel

  • op_i – Trigger to update Chance for the Chosen values

  • m_bod – The State of the Modal

  • dd – div withe the chosen values

Returns

update Modal Body for the Zoom

pages.Most_Probable_Explanation.erg_controller(n1, n2, n3, e_var, e_in)

Manages the MPE Reulst and the Switch if possible between Results

Parameters

  • n1 – event for generating Result

  • n2 – the Previous Result

  • n3 – the Next Result

  • e_var – the Dropdown of variable of Evidence Section

  • e_in – the Input for the Variables of Evidence Section

Returns

Div of the Result and if Previous or Next Result exists

pages.Most_Probable_Explanation.mpe(res, likelihood)

Generates the Result from Res of a Variable

Parameters

  • res – Results of a specific Variable

  • likelihood – The likelihood of the maxima

Returns

Div around the generated mpe Result of the Variable
